summary: Newspaperman Royer convinces government officials of a plan to obtain rubber by smuggling it out from under the Japanese. Carnahan is let out of prison to help.
cast: Spencer Tracy|James Stewart|Valentina Cortese|Sydney Greenstreet|John Hodiak|Lionel Barrymore|Gilbert Roland|Roland Winters|Richard Loo|Ian MacDonald|Tom Helmore|Lester Matthews|Joel Allen|Besmark Auelua|George M. title: Malaca
